description:
DescriptionA smooth matte lip tint helps create blurry and natural lip makeup looks.The new putty texture smoothly fills onto the lips and blurs out wrinkles and fine lines on the skin.Features 8 types of soft colors that gently wrap around your lips with a natural yet stunning look.Allows various lip combos that match your lip color of choice using it as a lip base by layering with other lip products.Promotes long-lasting adherence with its smudge-free and transfer-resistant lasting power.
01 Peach Puff02 Hush Grape03 Taupe Dawn04 Old Cherry05 Nudy Mango06 Strawberry Whip07 Teddy Beige08 Butter Pink00 Lip Matte
How To Use
Slightly press the container and use the putty spreader to apply evenly on your lips. Recommended to finish by blending with a lip brush.
Key Ingredients
Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Barium Sulfate, Diisostearyl Malate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), C13-15 Alkane, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Polysilicone-11, C10-18 Triglycerides, Tribehenin, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Sorbitan Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Fragrance, Lecithin, Silica Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Magnesium Myristate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
extra_description: Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Barium Sulfate, Diisostearyl Malate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), C13-15 Alkane, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Polysilicone-11, C10-18 Triglycerides, Tribehenin, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Sorbitan Isostearate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Fragrance, Lecithin, Silica Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Magnesium Myristate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

description:
Description

Achieve fuller, more defined lips in one effortless step with the Dearmay 2in1 Plumpy Lip Liner. This multi-tasking lip product combines the precision of a liner with the rich color of a lipstick. Its dual-shaped tip lets you outline and fill in your lips easily, creating a smooth, long-lasting finish. Available in six flattering shades that complement all skin tones, it’s your go-to for naturally voluminous, plumped-up lips.

How To UseLine: Use the slim tip to outline your lips for precise definition.Fill: Use the flat side to fill in your lips with color for a plump, full look.Blend if desired: Gently blend with your fingertip or a lip brush for a softer finish.

reviews.title: Subtle
reviews.content: I picked the silhouette sand shade to do some shading on my lips and face. The color is extremely subtle and barely appear on my face, but I think that's the point. It creates very natural shadows to make my lips look fuller and dimensions to my face. I have a light skin tone, and this shading color will likely not work for anyone darker than Merit Linen shade.

description:
Description
A lip pencil comes in 6 different natural lip colors, helps create a over lip line look.Perfectly created in a MLBB color that true to natural lip color, helps create a natural over-smudging lip line look.Glides on lips smoothly without caking.Offers long-hour adherence to keep a perfect over-lip look.
 
How To Use 1. Draw 1-2mm more than your original lip line to make the overall lip look bigger.2. Add extra three-dimensional effect by drawing it again on the shaded areas such as the tip, the tail and the bottom of the lips.3. Blend it naturally with your finger tip or lip brush.4. Fill in the inner lips with the desired lip color.

description:
Description
SLIM MATTE MAGIC: Introducing the Slim Stick Melting Matte, your secret weapon to achieving that coveted smooth & delicate sheer color. Glides on with pure comfort, merging the joy of effortless application with a lightweight, soft-focus finish. The unique blend of low-viscosity oil & gliding powder provides a beautiful melting texture, illuminating your lips with a rich hue that grows more vivid with each layer added. Kiss goodbye to clumping & flaking, and say hello to style on demandHYBRID INNOVATION: The Slim Stick Melting Matte is a testament to beauty advancement. Adopting a hybrid texture, we've fused the appeal of matte lipsticks with soft cashmere to endear a fluffy, blurry finish. The concept is to convey a sense of elegance and style while you enjoy the comfort of a creamy, luxurious texture. No longer do you have to compromise comfort for appearance. You can now step into any situation with an air of confidence and prideWEIGHT-LIGHT COMPOSITION: We understand the need for a product that is as light in weight as it is bold in color. That’s why the Slim Stick Melting Matte comprises a distinctive lightweight formula. Its soft-focus finish contributes to a dreamy, light-as-air affect on your lips. Owing to its low-viscosity oil and gliding powder combo, it ensures a sublime, foolproof application for a lasting impression. Unleash your inner glamazon with our slimmest, most lightweight lipstick yet!LAYER-LOVABLE: Just when you thought the Slim Stick Melting Matte couldn't get any better, we've added a vivid feature. The color of this marvel product becomes richer and more stunning with each application. Layer it up to your heart's content, until you strike the right balance between a bold, striking look and natural, everyday wear. Don't hold back when it comes to expressing your personal style, and watch as your confidence soars sky-highMOISTURE MIRACLE: Dry, chapped lips are a thing of the past! Power packed with moisturizing ingredients; the Slim Stick Melting Matte ensures lasting comfort, keeping your lips from drying out. This innovative formula locks in just the right amount of moisture, delivering an unrivaled level of hydration. Never again be concerned about discomfort wearing a matte formula. With the Slim Stick Melting Matte, you can show off your radiant smile & let your lips do the talking!

description:
Description

[2-in-1 Lip and Cheek Tint] Double the beauty! This versatile butter balm adds a pop of color to both your lips and cheeks, perfect for effortless, on-the-go glam.
[Creamy, Buttery Texture] Experience ultimate comfort with a lightweight, buttery formula that hydrates and glides on like a dream, leaving a fresh, dewy finish.
[Vibrant Color Selection] Express yourself with 10 stunning shades, from soft nudes to bold brights, tailored to match any mood, style, or occasion.
[Sharpener Included for Precision] Achieve flawless application every time with the included sharpener, ensuring clean, precise lines and zero mess.
[Premium Czech Craftsmanship] Crafted in the Czech Republic, this high-quality wooden pencil delivers smooth, seamless application with long-lasting wear that stays lightweight all day.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.content:
The Alternative Stereo Acoustic Matt Lip Balm is a unique take on lip care, offering a hydrating yet matte finish—a rare combination in lip balms. Unlike traditional balms that leave a glossy or greasy feel, this one provides a soft, velvety texture that keeps lips moisturized without shine.

The formula feels lightweight and comfortable, absorbing well while preventing dryness or chapping. It’s perfect for those who want nourished lips with a natural, non-glossy look. Plus, the subtle scent and smooth application make it an easy go-to for everyday use.

If you’re looking for a matte-finish lip balm that still delivers hydration, this is definitely worth a try!

product_name: The Sleek Lipstick Cream Matte (3 colors)
description:
Description


CREAMY MATTE BLUR FINISH : Create a delicate blurred lip effect effortlessly with a smooth-spreading, delicate blur effect. The remarkably smooth cream matte texture easily provide smooth and sophisticated look to the lips
EFFORTLESS OVER-LIP LOOK : With a slim 8mm pen-type shape, achieve a delicate touch to the inner lips effortlessly, creating a convenient and voluminous over-lip effect
EVOLUTIONARY LIP SKINCARE : Apply 10,000ppm of patented fermented centella oil, providing moisturizing care without concerns of keratin or dryness, strengthening the lip barrier

How To Use
 Lightly apply to both cheeks and eyes for a quick lip and cheek matching makeup! Using one color for both lips and cheeks allows for an easy and stylish tone-on-tone makeup look without the need for much effort
Key Ingredients
Diamethicon, isoamylauroate, diisostearyl malate, diphenyl dimethicon/vinyl diphenyldaEmethicon/silsesquioxane cross-polymer, titanium dioxide, vinyl dimethicon, methiconsilsesquioxane cross-polymer, isononyl isonanoate, etc.

It smooths out between the fine lines of the lips like a primer, and gives a smooth finish with a clean fit.

#Peach brown  #Burning Rose  #Nude Brick

Apply it gently from the inside of the lips with the built-in tip.

description:
Description

01 Uncommon Pink: a pink base color with a hint of vintage
02 Rose Nut: a toned-down rose with added brown nut
03 Mauve Fuchsia: a toned-down mauve contained in fuchsia
04 Ever Coral: a standard coral with ample orange tones
05 Almond Up: a subtle almond color with nude tones
06 Cup of Red: an autumn brick color with a cup of red (Go-to pick)

How To Use
Take an appropriate amount and apply on the lips.
Be sure to close the container cap completely during storage. 


Key Ingredients
It contains jojoba seed oil that makes you feel the moisturizing effect, and raspberry seed oil to protect the lips.

reviews.title: Wrong color!!!
reviews.content: I’ve ordered this espoir lipstick in #4 shade, but sadly that it ran out of stock. So they’ve sent an email to me to confirm the outstock of lipstick,which is really thoughtful of them. So I informed them to switch the color to washed berry cuz it is same price and sent with the exact screenshot of what I want. The package take so long to come (seem fine to me, cuz I knew it take time). But when it came, it was a nude color instead. I’m so disappointed.

description:
Description

A weightless matte lipstick that glides on smoothly and leaves your lips feeling moisturized. Gives you full-on color that lasts all day long without being flakey or cakey!
- All gorgeous colors instantly give you a chic, runway-worthy look
- Intense payoff with a velvety, matte finish
- An ultra-light, ultra-adhesive formula
- Lightweight & real matte texture
 
Suggested Use

1. Using the tip to apply softly from the inside part of your lips.
2. Apply a suitable amount then press your lips together 2 – 3 times.

reviews.title: My Experience using Rom&nd New Zero Matte Lipstick
reviews.content: The colors are rich, elegant and perfect for daily/bold looks. super comfortable & breathable. The packaging is sleek & minimalistic. Great for gradient lips/full coverage. But, It's not transfer proof, need to reapply and slightly clings to dry patches so exfoliating beforehand is key.
